short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover the internet's free encyclopedia by searching through Wikipedia!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever wanted to search something on Wikipedia but didn't have the time to type it out? 

Or do you enjoy watching Wikipedia speed run videos on YouTube and would love to explore on Wikipedia through Google Chrome?

If so, check out Wikipedia Adventure to begin discovering more about the world through the internet's free encyclopedia! Simply highlight some text, right click and begin your adventure through the context menu and onto Wikipedia!










__________________________
Wikipedia Adventure is in no way affiliated with Wikipedia or the Wikimedia Foundation.
